src:
Americký herec po desaťročiach ukázal priateľku. Všetkých odrovnal
Jeho nová láska je od neho o deväť rokov mladšia.
05 Nov 2019, 14:30 by zv
Keanu Reeves (55) za posledné desaťročia nemal vážnu známosť a počas jeho 35-ročnej kariéry sa neobjavil so žiadnou ženou ruka v ruke na červenom koberci, píše MailOnline. Až doteraz!
Americká hviezda sa na gala večeri LACMA Art + Film v Los Angeles objavil s priateľkou, jeho obchodnou spolupracovníčkou, umelkyňou a filantropkou Alexandrou Grant (46). Dvojica sa celý čas držala za ruky a vymieňala si zamilované pohľady napriek tomu, že na nich objektívmi mierili desiatky fotografov.
Keanu vyzeral, že je naozaj hrdý, že môže svetu predstaviť svoju partnerku. Alexandra zažiarila v modrých éterických šatách a na červenom koberci pôsobila šťastne a uvoľnene. Fanúšikov známeho herca si okamžite získala svojím krásnym úsmevom.
FOTKY NÁJDETE V GALÉRII.
Americká hviezda si vždy dobre chránila súkromie. Hovorí sa, že kedysi randil s Amandou De Cadenet, Claire Forlani či Sandrou Bullock, aké vážne to bolo a či naozaj tvoril s týmito ženami pár, to nevieme.
Jeho najväčšou doterajšou láskou však bola herečka Jennifer Syme. Dvojica spolu začala chodiť v roku 1998 a v roku 1999 Jennifer otehotnela. Ich šťastný spoločný život však zasiahla obrovská tragédia.
Dcérka Ava sa totiž narodila predčasne v ôsmom mesiaci, žiaľ, mŕtva. Herečka o dva roky nato, v roku 2001, taktiež zahynula pri autonehode v Los Angeles, mala len 28 rokov. Keanu tak prišiel o obe svoje lásky.
text:
The American actor showed his girlfriend after decades. He killed everyone
His new love is nine years younger from him.
05 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Vol
Keanu Reeves (55) has not been known for decades and has not appeared with any woman on the red carpet during his 35-year career, MailOnline writes. Until now!
An American star appeared at the LACMA Art + Film Gala in Los Angeles with a girlfriend, his business associate, artist and philanthropist Alexandra Grant (46). The couple held hands all the time, exchanging in love, despite the fact that dozens of photographers pointed at them.
Keanu seemed to be really proud to introduce his partner to the world. Alexandra glowed in her blue ethereal dress and looked happy and relaxed on the red carpet. She immediately won the fans of the famous actor with her beautiful smile.
PHOTOS YOU CAN FIND IN THE GALLERY.
An American star has always been well protected. It is said that he used to date Amanda De Cadenet, Claire Forlani or Sandra Bullock, how serious it was and whether he really made a couple with these women, we don't know.
His greatest love so far was actress Jennifer Syme. The couple started dating in 1998 and in 1999 Jennifer became pregnant. However, their happy life together was hit by a huge tragedy.
Ava's daughter was born prematurely in the eighth month, unfortunately, dead. Two years later, in 2001, she also died in a car accident in Los Angeles, only 28 years old. Keanu lost both of his love.
